programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dauphin à bord) S7 (6/7)
programme.desc: «Dauphin à bord»When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Agent spécial Blaze) S6 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Agent spécial Blaze»Special Mission Blaze: When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become Special Mission Blaze! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Super Roues) S6 (23/23)
programme.desc: «Super Roues»Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !) S6 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !»When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Lifguard Blaze!) S6 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Lifguard Blaze!»Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes. Can Blaze and AJ rescue all the trucks and become real lifeguards?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Enchanted Melody) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Enchanted Melody»When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le trésor légendaire) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le trésor légendaire»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Buds at First Bite) S1 (25/28)
programme.desc: «Buds at First Bite»Buds at First Bite: Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting. (S1, ep 23b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile) S5 (2/26)
programme.desc: «La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile»When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Love Day Cards»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (13/78)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Joyeux anniversaire, Blue !) S1 (11/17)
programme.desc: «Joyeux anniversaire, Blue !»It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Gros orage sur la Grande Vallée / La ruée vers l'or) S5 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Gros orage sur la Grande Vallée / La ruée vers l'or»Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des vaches et des cow-boys) S1 (27/48)
programme.desc: «Des vaches et des cow-boys»It's Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steel Antlers / Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Steel Antlers / Berry Bad»Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (15/78)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (61/78)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Stuck) S1 (n°62)
programme.desc: «Stuck»Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de Monsieur Fox) S4 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de Monsieur Fox»Granny and Grandpa Pig are celebrating their anniversary, and Peppa and George go to Mr Fox's shop to buy them a present. The shop is full of different things, so siblings don't know what to choose for their grandparents.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Going into the Wild) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Going into the Wild»For Halloween, the Barbababies play wolf and have fun scaring each other.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Abra-ka-Pickle) S5 (5/20)
programme.desc: «Abra-ka-Pickle»Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La super course de l'espace) S5 (9/20)
programme.desc: «La super course de l'espace»Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Montgolfière en fuite) S5 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Montgolfière en fuite»All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La famille Blaze) S5 (18/20)
programme.desc: «La famille Blaze»Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course de la Montagne Céleste) S6 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La course de la Montagne Céleste»At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dauphin à bord) S7 (6/7)
programme.desc: «Dauphin à bord»When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Agent spécial Blaze) S6 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Agent spécial Blaze»Special Mission Blaze: When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become Special Mission Blaze! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Super Roues) S6 (23/23)
programme.desc: «Super Roues»Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !) S6 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Autoneige Blaze, à la rescousse !»When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Lifguard Blaze!) S6 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Lifguard Blaze!»Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes. Can Blaze and AJ rescue all the trucks and become real lifeguards?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Enchanted Melody) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Enchanted Melody»When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le trésor légendaire) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le trésor légendaire»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Buds at First Bite) S1 (25/28)
programme.desc: «Buds at First Bite»Buds at First Bite: Baby enlists Goldie's help to show Penny Piranha how to stop biting. (S1, ep 23b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile) S5 (2/26)
programme.desc: «La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile»When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Love Day Cards»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside for a tiny bit more. Then they are called in for their bath. After that, Peppa and George brush their teeth and get into bed, so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down to watch television, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (17/78)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (18/78)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue est triste) S1 (6/17)
programme.desc: «Blue est triste»Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chemins de la gloire) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Les chemins de la gloire»Crusher is doing everything he can to keep the other monster machines away from the world championship racing at the Monster Dome; he tries with bubbles, mud balls and robotic knights.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Over the Rainbow) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Over the Rainbow»Over The Rainbow: The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et l'album souvenir) S1 (18/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et l'album souvenir»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Apple Pie) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Apple Pie»Guacamole: Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool. (S1, ep 6a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (16/78)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (21/78)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubble Trouble: Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! His friends are desperate to rescue him! (S1, ep 21).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»The Greedy Gobbler: While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! Then Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears! (S1, ep 67).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»Peppa and George learn that throwing waste away is fun, especially if you can divide it into special bins so that the waste can be reused. So recycle!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa and George go to the beach with Grandpa and Grandma Pig and find tide pools there. Peppa doesn't like it at first, but when she discovers what can be experienced with and in such pools and she even rescues a fish, she wants one too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bosse de maman Rabbit) S4 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La bosse de maman Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Glacier Monster Machine) S5 (10/21)
programme.desc: «Glacier Monster Machine»Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Semi-Remorque Blaze) S5 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Semi-Remorque Blaze»When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La voleuse de bonbons) S5 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La voleuse de bonbons»Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Derby Dino) S6 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Derby Dino»Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?
